website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing toy that's closer to the authentic Tamagotchi of the '90s.
pros: Personal customization with different faceplates to pop on and off of the toy
Various charm straps available as well
cons: Toy language is in Japanese, not English, unless you have a special adapter
However, some owners say it is intuitive enough to use in spite of the language barrier

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: I really love this color and it was the least expensive at the time that I purchased it. I love the training aspect in this Tamagotchi. You have to train it to use the restroom, clean up after itself and get ready for bed. There are also classes that they have to go to until they pass and it just makes it so interactive and fun. Compared to the IDL and the P's, raising your baby into the character you want is very simple and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Princess D

customer_reviews.title: I havent had one since I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Love it :) Perfect condition and works great. I chose this one because it can be adapted to English and have extra items if you get the app for it. I didn't however like the silver paint under the face-plate so I just removed it with rubbing alcohol. I now can customize it with whatever designs I want
customer_reviews.author: Your mom

customer_reviews.title: I love it :)
customer_reviews.text: So cute! (^__^) I've had it only two days and I have completely fallen in love. I was skeptical at first due to the language barrier (Japanese) but it seriously only took me an hour or so to get a feel for everything. There's plenty of guides online to help as well. I honestly think that the Japanese language/font only adds to the cuteness factor of it. Loved it so much that I ordered my husband one as well (we were both Tamagotchi fans in the late 90s. It's a simply beautiful product, and not nearly as needy as the ones I remember in my youth.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bracy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy that's been upgraded.
customer_reviews.text: Remember, this IS IN JAPANESE. I knew this when I purchased it mostly because there is a way to patch some of the text into English using an NFC reader. I managed to do that and it's great! I love that Tamagotchi's are still around and that they're in color now!
customer_reviews.author: Terri M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Nfc needed to translate to English
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I ordered on July 16 and it came on July 25 all the way from Japan to the US! 😲😍 super fast delivery. The product was brand new and everything was in Japanese. A lot of guides online so it was pretty east to figure out. But I did make use of my old galaxy s5 phone with nfc technology, I was able to download the English patch and many other cute content. I love this tamagotchi so much! It brought me back to my childhood and it matches perfectly with my gudetama tamagotchi!! Can't wait to add more to my collection! Well worth the money and nostalgia! 😍🎀🕹🎮🎆🍙🍜🐥🥳🤖🧚‍♀️👌
customer_reviews.author: Analis

customer_reviews.title: In Japanese, but still a fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun item! My daughter has played with this a lot. Yes, instructions are in Japanese, thus the 4 stars, but there is much info on the internet on how the buttons work & how to get each character, the meanings of different transformations and so on. The character designs are fun & lots of little fun surprises hidden in the programming of the toy- like holiday decorations for Halloween & Christmas. Great toy for long drives!
customer_reviews.author: morticia

customer_reviews.title: Tamagotchi, FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tama! Arrived immaculate and all the way for Japan. Easily patched into English (see Mr Blinky's site, you'll also need a compatible NFC smartphone from the comprehensive list on his Lord Blinky's site - I'm using a UK Xperia Z3)
customer_reviews.author: Spo0kleg

customer_reviews.title: Screen black. Not working.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this when we first got it. However, it’s been about 4 months and the screen won’t turn on anymore. It hasn’t been dropped or damaged in any way. My step daughter has played with it once every other weekend when she is with us. As she is with her mom most of the time and doesn’t take it with her. I don’t know who to reach out to to remedy. I would like the company to assist. Batteries work, the sounds are on, but screen is black. Is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: love this!!!! its in japanese but you can download and change it to english go on youtube or tama talk 4u to get more info

customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I read some blogs to translate to English and hand the tamagotchi menu memorized after a few glances. You don't miss out on much with the language barrier.

customer_reviews.title: Much brighter screen than any other model my daughter has ...
customer_reviews.text: Much brighter screen than any other model my daughter has had. Solid build, as expected, battery is now opened by pushing a button and sliding the lid, not by unscrewing the lid, as before. The gothchis now have much longer cycle of upbringing, you actually have to care for them for days before they fully grow up.
customer_reviews.author: driver8

customer_reviews.title: I love it~
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Tamagotchi 4U. It works perfectly and came within a week. Packaging was good and wasn't damaged at all. If you're thinking about getting the 4U you should know that it is only in JAPANESE. However there are videos online that tell you what everything does. If you love Tamagotchi then I 100% recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than expected to arrive, but overall great item and is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tamagotchi! It is very well made and you can change the face plates if you want to. I had slight difficulty trying to get it open to put in batteries, but that was kinda my fault. I got the white one because it was the cheapest, but I also feel it'd look nicer when I decide to change the face plate. I also love how the screen displays in color rather than black and white! It's all in Japanese but easy to learn. Have fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tilly

customer_reviews.title: Tamagotchi 4U!
customer_reviews.text: Bear in mind that this product is in Japanese. There are guides and tutorials online of how to play. Tamagotchi 4U has fun elements in and of itself, but if you want to download new characters and items, you must have an NFC (Near-Field Connection) device to do so. Lists of compatible devices can be found online. Someone once described the 4U has having a more "sophisticated" feel compared to other Tamagotchis- I completely agree. The gameplay is more complex than other Tamagotchis with the player being able to "train" this Tamagotchi to learn basic skills and more advanced skills (such as training the Tamagotchi to brush its own teeth). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend :)
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap (for a tamagotchi 4U), it arrived super fast, it was in good condition and packaged very securely. I would 10/10 recommend if you're in the market for a tama. Also, don't let the fact that it is in Japanese scare you off. There's English guides online [...]-that's a good English guide. After a day or two you don't even need the guide though, it's very easy to figure out.

customer_reviews.title: I just received my tamagotchi and I'm super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I just received my tamagotchi and I'm super happy with it, it's brand new everything works it's in Japanese but I want it to be. Just a warning becareful what you use to clean your screen with, its a plastic screen and not just any fabric can clean it ei. Your jeans aren't a good idea it will scrape the surface and turning on your tama you'll see all the lines from cleaning the screen with your pants, use something softer. Enjoy!

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tamagotchi

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again, maybe a 4U+ next time!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love my Tama, it got me on a crazy addiction! It is in Japanese, but very easy to figure out, even without the guides. It takes around 10-15 minutes to get the hang of it, and all the while you are amused by very cute characters. ^_^ loved it!! If you google the Tamagotchi version you will find help, so don't worry about not understanding exactly what is going on at first. (:

If you have an android smart phone that can download the app it's worth it. However, the app does not work on all phones, or any iphone. But it's a cool game@

product_meta.title: Bandaï Tamagotchi 4U White ( Tamagotchi 4U White)
product_meta.description: A new generation of TAMAGOTCHI, gTAMAGOTCHI 4Uh. You can connect with others! TAMAGOTCHI 4U allows you to connect with other by using the touch function of the device. You can connect with other 4U devices, and with just a touch you can exchange profiles and do fortune telling. You can download characters and items by getting the 4U app or data spots. You can download and raise your own TAMAGOTCHI on the 4U, with 8 slots available. You can remove the front cover of the device and change them with other 4U covers, or connect them with charm straps. Customise your TAMAGOTCHI 4U with your favorite colors and designs, now! (Covers and straps are sold separately). Bandai TAMAGOTCHI 4U WHITE ( Tamagotchi 4U White) (japan import)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars265 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
